select c.custom_name,c.contract_no,to_char(c.delivery_period,'yyyy-MM-dd') as delivery_period,to_char(c.ship_time,'yyyy-MM-dd') as ship_time,c.trade_terms, cp.product_no,concat(cp.cnumber,cp.packing_unit) as cnumber,cp.factory_name from (select contract_id,custom_name,contract_no,delivery_period,ship_time,trade_terms from contract_c) c left join (select contract_id,product_no,cnumber,packing_unit,factory_name from contract_product_c) cp on c.contract_id=cp.contract_id
where to_char(c.ship_time,'yyyy-MM') = #{inputDate}
